typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID),
	ProductID = count()) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 aggregate(groupBy(Name,
		Aggregate1@ProductID),
	rowcount = count()) ~> Aggregate2
